snippet: The Fox Lake police officer whose fatal shooting last month set off a manhunt was shot twice with his own weapon, and there were signs of a struggle at the scene, the lead investigator said Thursday.
abstract: Illinois police say Fox Lake Police Officer Lt Charles Gliniewicz was shot twice with his own weapon; Gliniewicz was found dead after reporting he was pursuing three men, and his death has set off manhunt.
lead_paragraph: The Fox Lake police officer whose fatal shooting last month set off a manhunt was shot twice with his own weapon, and there were signs of a struggle at the scene, the lead investigator said Thursday.

headline.print_headline: Illinois: Officer Was Killed With His Own Gun
headline.main: Illinois: Officer Was Killed With His Own Gun
